001package org.nasdanika.ncore.util;
002
003import java.util.AbstractMap;
004import java.util.AbstractSet;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.Collection;
007import java.util.Iterator;
008import java.util.Objects;
009import java.util.Set;
010
011import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
012
013/**
014 * A map which takes specifics of {@link SemanticIdentity} equals into account and also provides get methods by UUID and URI
015 * @author Pavel
016 *
017 * @param <V>
018 */
019public class SemanticMap<K extends SemanticIdentity, V> extends AbstractMap<K,V> {
020        
021        private Collection<Entry<K, V>> data = new ArrayList<>();
022        
023        private Set<Entry<K, V>> entrySet = new AbstractSet<Entry<K, V>>() {
024
025                @Override
026                public int size() {
027                        return data.size();
028                }
029
030                @Override
031                public Iterator<Entry<K, V>> iterator() {
032                        Iterator<Entry<K, V>> dataIterator = data.iterator();
033                        return new Iterator<Entry<K,V>>() {
034
035                                @Override
036                                public boolean hasNext() {
037                                        return dataIterator.hasNext();
038                                }
039
040                                @Override
041                                public Entry<K, V> next() {
042                                        return dataIterator.next();
043                                }
044                                
045                                public void remove() {
046                                        dataIterator.remove();
047                                };
048                                
049                        };
050                }
051
052                @Override
053                public boolean add(Entry<K, V> e) {
054                        for (Entry<K, V> de: data) {
055                                if (Objects.equals(de.getKey(), e.getKey())) {
056                                        return false;
057                                }
058                        }
059                        return data.add(e);
060                }
061                
062        };
063
064        @Override
065        public Set<Entry<K, V>> entrySet() {
066                return entrySet;
067        }
068        
069        @Override
070        public V put(K key, V value) {
071                for (Entry<K, V> de: data) {
072                        if (Objects.equals(de.getKey(), key)) {
073                                return de.setValue(value);
074                        }
075                }
076                
077                data.add(new Entry<K, V>() {
078                        
079                        V entryValue = value;
080
081                        @Override
082                        public K getKey() {
083                                return key;
084                        }
085
086                        @Override
087                        public V getValue() {
088                                return entryValue;
089                        }
090
091                        @Override
092                        public V setValue(V newValue) {
093                                V ret = entryValue;
094                                entryValue = newValue;
095                                return ret;
096                        }
097                });
098
099                return null;
100        }
101        
102        /**
103         * Find entry by URI
104         * @param key
105         * @return
106         */
107        public Entry<K,V> find(URI identifier) {
108                if (identifier != null) {
109                        for (Entry<K, V> e: entrySet()) {
110                                if (e.getKey().getIdentifiers().contains(identifier)) {
111                                        return e;
112                                }
113                        }
114                }
115                return null;            
116        }
117
118}
